mapper.select: SELECT schedule_type, schedule_date, start_time, end_time, title FROM t_member_schedule WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY schedule_date desc, start_time asc, end_time asc
SELECT schedule_seq, member_seq, schedule_type, schedule_date, start_time, end_time, title FROM t_member_schedule WHERE schedule_seq = #{scheduleSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_member_schedule ( member_seq, schedule_type, schedule_date, start_time, end_time, title, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{memberSeq}, #{scheduleType}, #{scheduleDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{title}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_member_schedule SET schedule_type = #{scheduleType}, schedule_date = #{scheduleDate}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, title = #{title} WHERE shedule_seq = #{scheduleSeq}
